'''Trove of Marvelous Treasures''' is [[Ningguang]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The following ores will be displayed on the mini-map: [[Iron Chunk|Iron Ore]], [[White Iron Ore]], [[Starsilver|Starsilver Ore]], [[Crystal Ore]], [[Magical Crystal Chunk|Magic Crystal Ore]], [[Amethyst Lump|Amethyst Ore]] and [[Condessence Crystal|Condessence Crystal Ore]].
* Local specialties such as [[Cor Lapis]] and [[Noctilucous Jade]] will not appear on the mini-map.
* {{Talent Note|character=Ningguang|talent=Trove of Marvelous Treasures|dead}}
* Only one ore location will be shown on the mini-map at a time.
